name: Waldir @ GitHub
body:
###About me
I'm [Waldir Pimenta](http://waldirpimenta.com) and this is the page I keep as the central hub for my open source projects and contributions.
* [list of all my repos](https://github.com/search?q=%40waldir&type=Repositories)
* [overview of my commits](http://ghcontributors.herokuapp.com/waldir) to various repos
* overview of my [latest activity](https://github.com/waldir?tab=activity) at github

### Todo (mostly quick fixes)
* **[hash-my-pass](https://github.com/waldir/hash-my-pass/):**
  continue working on the [new index page](http://waldir.github.io/hash-my-pass/index.new.html)
  ([source](https://github.com/waldir/hash-my-pass/blob/gh-pages/index.new.html)).
  cf. the [current one](http://waldir.github.io/hash-my-pass/)
* **[odot](https://github.com/waldir/odot/):**
  for this one there's actually a pretty detailed plan laid out in the
  [roadmap](https://github.com/waldir/odot/issues/milestones).
* **[primerpedia](https://github.com/waldir/primerpedia/):**
  [add a footer](https://github.com/waldir/primerpedia/issues/12)
* **[unix-manifests](https://github.com/waldir/unix-manifests/):**
  [add popularity data](https://github.com/waldir/unix-manifests/issues/1)
* **[semantic-linebreaker](https://github.com/waldir/semantic-linebreaker/):**
  TBD
* **[holography-tutorial](https://github.com/waldir/holography-tutorial/):**
  TBD
* **[procrastinever](https://github.com/waldir/procrastinever/):**
  TBD
* **[@btongminh/mwclient](https://github.com/btongminh/mwclient/):**
  [migrate the sourceforge wiki to github](https://github.com/btongminh/mwclient/issues/12)
* **[waldir.github.io](https://github.com/waldir/waldir.github.io):**
  complete the page with missing links

### Non-github open source activity:

#### Code
* [sourceforge](http://sourceforge.net/users/waldir) (nothing to see here)
* [bitbucket](https://bitbucket.org/waldyrious) (so far I've only reported [a few issues in the Snuggle repo](https://bitbucket.org/grouplens/snuggle/issues?reported_by=waldyrious))
* [google code](http://code.google.com/u/117802857503272599472/)
* mediawiki: [gerrit](https://gerrit.wikimedia.org/r/#/q/owner:waldir%2540email.com+project:mediawiki/core+status:merged,n,z) (alt: [github](https://github.com/wikimedia/mediawiki-core/commits?author=waldir))

#### Bugs, translations, content:
* launchpad:
  [commented bugs](https://bugs.launchpad.net/~waldir/+commentedbugs),
  [reported bugs][LP],
  [translations](https://translations.launchpad.net/~waldir)
* bugzilla:
  @mozilla ([reported][MZ1], commented), ...
* translatewiki: 
* openstreetmap:
  [map](http://hdyc.neis-one.org/?Waldir),
  [wiki](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Special:Contributions/Waldir)
* Wikimedia wikis:
* other wikis:
  explainxkcd,
  [lyrics.wikia.com](http://lyrics.wikia.com/Special:Contributions/Waldir)
  UniversalEditButton,
* SETI:
  [SETI@home](http://boincstats.com/stats/user_graph.php?pr=sah&id=1363297),
  [setiquest wiki](http://setiquest.org/wiki/index.php/Special:Contributions/Waldir),
  [boinc-wiki.info](http://www.boinc-wiki.info/Special:Contributions/Waldir)

[More...](http://checkvist.com/checklists/152404/tasks/7083180)

TODO: merge the [My open source experience](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XoepKYhGHZZiagwoyQZ1t9X62pFGmlXxQBW8Reb58g4) Google doc here

[[edit this page](https://github.com/waldir/waldir.github.io/generated_pages/new)]

[LP]: https://bugs.launchpad.net/~waldir/+reportedbugs?field.status:list=NEW&field.status:list=OPINION&field.status:list=INVALID&field.status:list=WONTFIX&field.status:list=EXPIRED&field.status:list=CONFIRMED&field.status:list=TRIAGED&field.status:list=INPROGRESS&field.status:list=FIXCOMMITTED&field.status:list=FIXRELEASED&field.status:list=INCOMPLETE_WITH_RESPONSE&field.status:list=INCOMPLETE_WITHOUT_RESPONSE
[MZ1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/buglist.cgi?email1=waldir%40email.com&emailtype1=exact&emailassigned_to1=1&emailreporter1=1&list_id=6369371
